ValidationRule.description: Condition value is required if field type is condition.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( AND(ISPICKVAL( Field_Use__c , "Condition"), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type__c,"In")),NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type__c,"Not In"))) , ISBLANK( Condition_Value__c ) , FALSE)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The condition value is required when field type is "Condition" and Type is not "Not In" and "In".
